skill.name: Burn
skill.description: Scorch targets with searing heat. Effect: Deals fire damage.

skill.name: Burn All
skill.description: Scorch everyone in range with searing heat. Effect: Deals fire damage.

skill.name: Disintegrate
skill.description: Splash targets with strong acid. Effect: Deals corrosion damage over time.

skill.name: Disintegrate All
skill.description: Cover everyone within range in strong acid. Effect: Deals corrosion damage over time.

skill.name: Heal
skill.description: Heals the wounds of the targets. Effect: Restores HP.

skill.name: Heal All
skill.description: Heals the wounds of everyone within range. Effect: Restores HP.

skill.name: Command:Report
skill.description: Observe the details of the target.
